TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that blocks an enzyme called NEDD8-activating enzyme (NAE). NAE is involved in important cell functions, such as cell division. Blocking NAE may help keep cancer cells from growing and may kill them. Some NEDD8-activating enzyme inhibitors are being studied in the treatment of cancer. They are a type of targeted therapy. Also called NAE inhibitor.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "NEDD8-activating enzyme inhibitor"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "inhibidor de la enzima activadora de NEDD8"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: inhibidor de la enzima activadora de NEDD8

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia que bloquea la enzima activadora de NEDD8 (NAE). La NAE participa en funciones importantes de la célula, como la división celular. Es posible que bloquear la NAE ayude a evitar la formación de células cancerosas y las destruya. Algunos inhibidores de la enzima activadora de NEDD8 se estudian para el tratamiento del cáncer y se usan para un tipo de terapia dirigida. También se llama inhibidor de la NAE.
